overview: Success has James Brewster's name written all over it, and he also has his heart set on his boss's daughter. A con artist hires him to help out on a bank scheme, but then again, James will do anything to get rich and be the most successful businessman in Britain-even if it means murder!!!
tagline: It purrs like a Rolls Royce... It pleasures like bubbly champagne...
title: Nothing But the Best
